title: Women in Hollywood celebrates success, calls for equality
text:
> Entertainment Women in Hollywood celebrates success, calls for equality Ava DuVernay attends the 2015 ELLE Women in Hollywood Awards at the Four Seasons Hotel on October 19, 2015 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
